Drinking this potion will shrink you down to 30 percent your original size. One positive of being so small is becoming more aerodynamic, allowing you to run faster! Give it all you got by sprinting when you press the square button.\n\nNote: The affects of this potion temporarily wear off when performing certain gestures. [#Legal]
